name: Jewels Jungle Treasure: Match 3 Puzzle
description:
Jewels Jungle Treasure, exploring style match 3 gems jewels game in lost jungle.💎
Uncover the unknown secret and collect valuable treasures as you play through match fun with challenging chapters.
Jewels Jungle Treasure is an addictive and exciting legend adventure match 3 game filled with colorful jewels crunching effects!
Match and quest treasure gems jewels in dazzling combinations in this lost jungle temple journey!
This sparkling puzzle adventure will instantly sate your wanderlust and craving for jewels treasure.
You have to overcome the difficulties to get the goal and quest real treasures using old maps in this kingdom.
If you like swapping and matching jewels then you will love this addictively game. Highly recommended to all fans of puzzle and match three games.

HOW TO PLAY
👉 List of goals that need to be completed in each level
👉 Match 3 more identical jewels quickly and swap special jewels.
👉 Use helpful props or power-ups if you passing a tricky level.
👉 Make super combinations with super match.
👉 Less moves, Higher scores, More Stars.🏆
👉 Try to get all stars in each level, become jewels hero legend.

FEATURES
📎 Colourful AND lost temple style graphics!
📎 2000+ amazing levels!
📎 Cast spells to use powerful boosters!
📎 Crush all jewels, Precise mashing jewels.
📎 Sharpest brain puzzle game.

Embark on this jewels jungle adventure, match 3 and switching your way to the jungle through addictive gameplay.👣
Download Jewels Jungle Treasure, send your feedback, help us to improve this jewels game!
